entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
